South African foreign minister: states must stop funding Israel's militaryAll states have an obligation to stop funding and facilitating Israel's military actions in Gaza after the World Court indicated that those actions could plausibly be genocidal, South African foreign minister Naledi Pandor said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 13:46:33 GMT YNAKRZUEVNNTPFT5ZSX6ZXGS7I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/south-african-foreign-minister-states-must-stop-funding-israels-military-2024-01-31/Reuters世界中东
Gaza ambulances become mobile clinics as fighting blocks way to hospitalsThe ambulance left its usual home base at Nasser Hospital in Khan Younis six days ago with as many bandages, syringes and other basics as its crew could find, and has been operating as a mobile clinic ever since as there is no way back. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 13:39:03 GMT 53PUR2M5NJPD7IZJJCV3MMLUTY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-ambulances-become-mobile-clinics-fighting-blocks-way-hospitals-2024-01-31/Fadi Shana, Ibraheem Abu Mustafa世界中东
Russia and Ukraine say they have completed a prisoner exchangeRussia and Ukraine said on Wednesday they had completed a prisoner exchange, the first since the crash last week of a Russian military transport plane that Moscow says was carrying 65 Ukrainian soldiers ahead of a similar swap. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 13:36:42 GMT IVIBWFTISBI37BGMVNEDD4ZD3Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-ukraine-say-they-have-completed-prisoner-exchange-2024-01-31/Reuters世界欧洲
Scholz evokes Nazi era as he urges Germans to reject far rightChancellor Olaf Scholz reminded Germans of their Nazi past on Wednesday as he called on citizens to reject the far-right Alternative for Germany (AfD) which is second in most national polls. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 13:27:56 GMT 6OVH2VIRGFOCHBUC2ILQZCHRCE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/scholz-evokes-nazi-era-he-urges-germans-reject-far-right-2024-01-31/Reuters世界欧洲
India deploys unprecedented naval might near Red Sea to rein in piracyIndia has deployed at least a dozen warships east of the Red Sea to provide security against pirates and has investigated more than 250 vessels as Western powers focus on attacks by Yemen's Iran-backed Houthis, Indian officials said. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 13:20:50 GMT C253AANB3JKCDD4VJJE66JREVE https://www.reuters.com/world/india-deploys-unprecedented-naval-might-near-red-sea-rein-piracy-2024-01-31/Krishn Kaushik世界
Will Western aid plug Ukraine's gaping budget deficit in 2024?European Union countries are due to meet on Thursday to try to agree on extending billions of euros in economic aid to Ukraine, as well as replenishing a military fund to arm Kyiv as it fights Russia's almost two-year-old full-scale invasion. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 13:12:44 GMT RKQJJDW25BIEZLVNP4JM7YPZEU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/will-western-aid-plug-ukraines-gaping-budget-deficit-2024-2024-01-31/Olena Harmash世界欧洲
Indian court allows Hindus to pray in Varanasi mosque - lawyerAn Indian court on Wednesday ruled that Hindus can offer prayers in a 17th century mosque in the holy city of Varanasi, a lawyer for the Hindu petitioners said, days after a survey said the mosque was built after the destruction of a temple there. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 13:02:02 GMT QTJGEEFTQFPIBJN6PLN3JXDPR4 https://www.reuters.com/world/india/indian-court-allows-hindus-pray-varanasi-mosque-lawyer-2024-01-31/Reuters世界印度
Pakistan election candidate shot dead in tribal district - policeA national assembly candidate in Pakistan's election next week was shot and killed on Wednesday in the tribal district along Afghan border, police said, amid fears of an uptick in militant violence around the parliamentary vote. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 13:00:17 GMT NPGDR443OVKU5DSGJSIQTX3ZAA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-election-candidate-shot-dead-tribal-district-police-2024-01-31/Mushtaq Ali世界亚太地区
World Court to rule on whether Russia violated international treaties in UkraineThe United Nations' top court will rule on Wednesday on whether Russia violated an anti-terrorism treaty by funding pro-Russian separatists in Ukraine, including those who shot down Malaysia Airlines flight MH17 in 2014. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 12:10:23 GMT OOOIMFKYGZJNFH3ML3H2MVH2PE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/world-court-rule-whether- Russia-violated-international-treaties-ukraine-2024-01-31/Stephanie Van Den Berg世界欧洲
Farmers in Europe step up protests against rising costs, green rulesThe French government on Wednesday sent armoured vehicles to protect a wholesale food market in Paris, in a sign of escalating tensions as farmers blocked highways in France and Belgium and protests spread elsewhere in Europe. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 11:33:40 GMT TMXS66PCFNJZFFG7IRVAOVFKH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/farmers-europe-step-up-protests-against-rising-costs-green-rules-2024-01-31/Marco Trujillo, Philip Blenkinsop可持续发展气候与能源
US says fentanyl talks with China 'meaningful' but more needs to be done-officialTalks between the U.S. and Chinese officials on stemming the flow of chemicals used for the production of deadly fentanyl have been "substantive" but "much more" needs to be done, the head of the White House delegation to Beijing said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 11:04:27 GMT UXX5QVAOSBIXXKWZARNXFZXT7A https://www.reuters.com/world/us-says-fentanyl-talks-with-china-meaningful-more-needs-be-done-official-2024-01-31/Antoni Slodkowski世界
